description:
After using a roulette table to determine ingredients, what could possibly come next? How about a slot machine? Suwabara steps up and wins a lot of coins at the slots, but things sound too good to be true… and what’s this about Lu-pan?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le lu-pain 3 ! La pain d`épice à la Kai
Lupan 3 Gou!! Pan De Ebisu Kai!
ลูแปงหมายเลข3 แปงเดอเอปิสไค
ルパン3号! パン・デ・エピス戒(改)!
